name: Ulme Project
description:
This project is derived from a game I made some time ago, called Mechadronoids.

You are an entrepreneur, who has been sent to utilize this piece of volume. To make sure that you won't feel too comfortable a competitor has been sent as well. Whichever one of you comes out on top has the Supreme Emperor's blessing.

HOW TO PLAY

  • SPACE to advance turns
  • ESC to exit
  • MOUSE for other functions
  • Read tooltips - they contain lots of useful information
